Title: Aqua Sport Perfume (EDP) for Men, 50 ml, A Long-Lasting Fragrance with the Freshness and Soothing Scent of Mystical woods/ Zesty
Description:
Timeless Aqua Sport is a men's fragrance designed to evoke a sense of rugged masculinity and confidence.
Combines the freshness of grapefruit and lemon with the sweetness of black currant.
Perfect for those looking to add an enigmatic quality to their personal style.
Elegant and sophisticated scent that appeals to a wide range of men.
Available in a variety of sizes for convenient use and travel.
A great gift idea for any man who wants to elevate his personal style.

Title: Inspire Perfume (EDP) for Men - 50ml, Men’s Long Lasting Fragrance with a Fruity Spike and Earthy notes of Cedar and Vetiver
Description:
Inspire for men is an intriguing mix of French Bergamot and crunchy apple that accords a fruity spike.
The magical confluence of fragrant cinnamon, luscious vanilla and creamy sandal gives a phenomenal impetus to the woody base of cedar and earthy vetiver.

Title: Triumph Perfume (EDP) for Men - 50ml, Long Lasting Fragrance with a Fruity appeal and exotic notes of patchouli and lavendar
Description:
A perfect balance of juicy pear and sweet pineapple with spicy cardamom makes it arduously aromatic and woody making it a perfect jewel to be adorned by those men who have triumphed in life’s tenacious battles. 
The vibrancy of lavender augmented by geranium’s green facet and powdery iris add a touch of intrigue to the blend. His humble heart will adore the soft tones of vanilla smeared in a base of exotic patchouli and everlasting silage.
50 ML Pack

Title: Magnate Perfume (EDP) for Men - 50ml : A Long-Lasting and Rejuvenating Fragrance of Success , Smoky, Spicy and Woody notes of Cedar and Sandalwood
Description:
Magnate- only worthy of those who strive for success and perfection.
A riot of sense-awakening fragrances like the lively pink pepper, sparkling bergamot, and elemi mingled together with opulent Taif rose.
Just like the synchrony of his large heart and sharp mind, the aromatic lavender, exotic woody notes of patchouli and vetiver create a symphony with the woody blend of cedar and creamy sandalwood to give him an edge over others.

Title: Men's Perfume (EDP) Discovery Set
Description:
Bryan & Candy Men's Discovery Set Perfume is a collection of four distinct and unique fragrances: Inspire, Magnate, Triumph, and Aqua Sport.
Each fragrance comes in a compact 8ml bottle, making it easy to carry and use on-the-go.
The perfumes are all eau de parfum (EDP), which means they have a higher concentration of fragrance oils and are longer lasting compared to eau de toilette (EDT) or cologne.
The fragrances in this set are carefully curated and crafted to offer a range of scents that suit different moods and occasions.
The soothing fragrances are designed to evoke a sense of confidence and sophistication in the wearer, making them perfect for the man of today.
The Bryan & Candy Men's Discovery Set Perfume offers a great opportunity to sample and discover new fragrances, or to gift to someone special who enjoys quality and long-lasting perfumes.
